app.title: Velib stations - find a velib station very quickly
app.name: Velib stations
app.desc: Find a velib station very quickly, according to your location or given address.

errors.routefail: Route to station cannot be found
errors.geodenied: The request for Geolocation was denied.
errors.timeout: The request to get user location timed out

usagepicker.onbike: I am on the bike right now
usagepicker.onfoot: I am by foot right now
usagepicker.lookforstands: And I am looking for a station with
usagepicker.lookforbikes: And I am looking for a station with

coffee.title: This app is free
coffee.desc: And it always will! It was created in my free time, so if you enjoy it you can always buy me a coffee or contribute to the development.
coffee.githublink: Source code is hosted on github:
coffee.paypallink: And here you can buy me a coffee:
coffee.dismiss: It's sweet and all, but don't show me this again.

global.title: City bikes - find bikes and stations in polish cities.
global.desc: Interactive map of nextbike bikes in Poznan, Warsaw, Cracow, Wroclaw and other polish cities.

poznan.title: Poznański Rower Miejski - znajdź stacje na interaktywnej mapie
poznan.desc: Znajdź stacje lub dostępne rowery miejskie na mapie Poznania. Aktualne informacje na temat dostępności rowerów.
